title: Ben Boyce's and Jesus' Heirarchy of Religious Value
description:
I LOVED this video that Ben did, and I can't stay away from it. I butt my big nose in and play the uninvited Pastor. I hope it's helpful. 

Benjamin Boyce Variety of Religious Experience https://youtu.be/BEyttu7UCAE 

My conversation with BB https://youtu.be/wYNI6810bz4
Religion and Philosophy in the West https://www.audible.com/pd/Philosophy-and-Religion-in-the-West-Audiobook/B00DEQQO9I 
Charles Taylor A Secular Age https://www.amazon.com/Secular-Age-Charles-TAYLOR-ebook/dp/B002KFZLK2 
Henri Nouwen at L'Arche https://www.larcheusa.org/who-we-are/henri-nouwen/
Henri Nouwen The Wounded Healer https://www.amazon.com/Wounded-Healer-Ministry-Contemporary-Doubleday-ebook/dp/B00G8ELSFS 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
